description: I am a .NET developer in Mexico, my goal is to become a researcher, but before becoming a researcher I have to work to live, and currently work as a .NET developer, all the programming knowledge I have is acquired self-taught and that makes me feel so incredible. Finally, I have to tell you that I am an open-source contributor on small projects made with C and F#, am in love with the F# programming language (the vision of its creator Don Syme just blows my mind) and am currently looking to contribute to the F# compiler, wish me luck üçÄ
detailOrQuote: After working for a couple of years in the automotive industry as a mechatronics technician and stopping my career as a result of the covid-19 pandemic, in 2021 I decide to resume my university studies. I spent two years studying engineering in Artificial Intelligence but for personal reasons I have to work.
